meanings.definition: a small, flat, reddish-brown insect that feeds on the blood of humans and animals while they sleep
meanings.sent1: I woke up with itchy bites on my skin, and the culprit turned out to be a bedbug.
meanings.sent2: Exterminators were called to get rid of the bedbugs infesting the apartment.
meanings.sent3: The bedbug seemed to have a taste for my blood, making me feel like a midnight snack.
meanings.sent4: The bedbug, a tiny vampire of the insect world, stealthily sucked blood as we slept.
meanings.sent5: The sight of a bedbug crawling on the mattress sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.definition: a person who is annoying or causes trouble
meanings.sent1: My little brother can be a real bedbug when he keeps asking questions during my favorite TV show.
meanings.sent2: The new student turned out to be a bedbug, always picking fights with classmates.
meanings.sent3: Despite his small size, he was a bedbug in the office, constantly bothering his coworkers.
meanings.sent4: She was like a persistent bedbug, buzzing around and irritating everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The bedbug of the group, always causing chaos wherever he went.
